backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all core data types (UserProfile, Project, Contractor, Bill, NMR, Payment) and in-memory maps for a construction billing system, with mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the 'Add User' button was added to the UsersPage header for admin users, referencing the relevant file and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose and key changes, serving as a build/change reference for the frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the UI.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, mounting the app at `#root` and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all application routes (index redirects to /users), wraps the app in QueryClient, ThemeProvider, and error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AppShell/AppShel: Layout wrapper combining the Sidebar with a scrollable main content area and an optional banner slot.
frontend/src/components/AppShell/RoleBad: Badge component that displays a human-readable label and visual variant for a given UserRole enum value.
frontend/src/components/AppShell/Sidebar: Navigation sidebar showing role-filtered nav items, user profile info with RoleBadge, and a logout button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/CurrentInternetI: Fixed bottom-right panel displaying the current Internet Identity principal with a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/dialogs/DeleteWi: An alert dialog that requires the user to enter a password before confirming a delete action, resetting the input on cancel or confirm.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorBounda: React class-based error boundary that catches unhandled errors and renders a FatalErrorFallback component instead of crashing the app.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorFallba: Displays a full-screen error card with error details and a reload button, used as a fallback UI when the application encounters an unrecoverable error.
Renders an informational banner notifying the user they are in guest mode, with a button to trigger sign-in.
frontend/src/components/ProfileStatusBan: Displays a status banner with loading, error, or info variants, optionally showing retry and logout action buttons for error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend data operations including user profiles, projects, contractors, bills, NMRs, and payments using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/dates.ts: Utility functions for adding days to a date string and formatting a date string into a localized Indian English format.
frontend/src/lib/formatters/currency.ts: Exports a single utility function that formats a number as Indian Rupee currency using the Intl.NumberFormat API.
frontend/src/lib/roleAccess.ts: Defines role-based access control helper functions and role conversion utilities for the application's UserRole enum.
frontend/src/lib/units.ts: Exports a constant array of measurement unit strings and a corresponding TypeScript type used for bill line items.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/analytics/AnalyticsPa: Placeholder analytics page that displays a heading and a card noting that trade-wise totals, top-3 summaries, and advanced filtering features are coming soon.
Dialog form for creating a new bill, collecting project, contractor, trade, pricing, and description fields, then submitting via the useCreateBill mutation with toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/bills/BillsPage.tsx: Main bills listing page that fetches and displays bills in a sortable table with role-based controls for raising, viewing, and deleting bills, including error and loading states.
Read-only dialog that displays full details of a selected bill including status badge, financial breakdown, and approval information for PM, QC, and billing stages.
frontend/src/pages/contractors/Contracto: Dialog form for creating or editing a contractor record, pre-populating fields when editing and submitting via create or update mutations with validation and toast notifications.
The main contractors list page with filtering, and actions to view, edit, and delete contractors based on user role permissions.
A read-only dialog component that displays full details of a selected contractor, including contact info, pricing, and attachments.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardPa: Dashboard page showing summary statistics (total bills, completed payments, paid amounts) derived from bills and payments data, with authentication-aware rendering.
frontend/src/pages/Deactivated.tsx: Full-screen page shown to deactivated users, displaying an account deactivated message and a logout button that clears identity and query cache.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page component that renders a centered card with a PayGo logo and a login button using Internet Identity authentication, with an optional cancel/close callback.
frontend/src/pages/nmr/NMRFormDialog.tsx: A dialog form for creating new NMR (weekly labour records) with dynamic entry rows, auto-calculated amounts, and submission to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/nmr/NMRPage.tsx: The main NMR list page displaying weekly records with status badges, and actions to view, create, and delete NMRs based on user role.
frontend/src/pages/nmr/NMRViewDialog.tsx: A read-only dialog that displays full NMR details including a tabular breakdown of labour entries, approval statuses, and total amounts.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFormD: A dialog form component for recording a new payment against an approved bill, with validation and fields for bill selection, date, and amount.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentsPage: The main payments list page that displays all payments in a table with role-based controls for creating, viewing, and deleting payments.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentViewD: A read-only dialog that displays detailed information for a single payment, including amounts, status badge, project, and contractor.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileLoadError.tsx: Error page displayed when a user's profile cannot be loaded, offering a logout button that clears identity and query cache, along with possible reasons for the failure.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetup.tsx: Fallback page that auto-triggers a login mutation when an identity is present and shows a loading spinner; no longer used in the main flow since RootLayout handles auto-login.
frontend/src/pages/projects/ProjectFormD: A dialog form for creating or editing a project, handling fields like name, client, budget, addresses, and status with create/update mutations.
frontend/src/pages/projects/ProjectsPage: The main projects list page with search and status filtering, a sortable table, and role-based controls for creating, editing, viewing, and deleting projects.
frontend/src/pages/projects/ProjectViewD: A read-only dialog that displays full project details including addresses, budget, status badge, and clickable location links.
frontend/src/pages/users/AddUserInfoDial: A read-only informational dialog that explains the three-step process for onboarding a new user (share link, user logs in, assign role) with no form inputs.
A dialog form for editing an existing user's role and active status, using the useUpdateUser mutation to persist changes.
frontend/src/pages/users/UsersPage.tsx: The main users management page that lists all registered users in a table with view, edit, and delete actions, gated by the current user's role permissions.
A read-only dialog that displays all profile details of a selected user including PayGo ID, name, email, role badge, and principal.
frontend/src/routes/RootLayout.tsx: The root layout component that handles authentication state, auto-creates user profiles on first login, shows contextual banners (guest, loading, error), and renders the AppShell with child routes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routes, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the theme with oklch-based design tokens (colors, border radius, shadows, animations) and registering typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state (version 3), recording a known issue and pending action request to restore a missing 'Add User' button on the Users page that should open the existing AddUserInfoDialog.
